home.title: Women Spot - Your Comprehensive Health and Wellness Platform
home.description: Discover articles, tips, and resources to improve your health and well-being. Access comprehensive health content in multiple languages.
home.keywords: health, wellness, fitness, nutrition, articles, tips, resources, multilingual

signin.title: Sign In - Women Spot
signin.description: Sign in to your Women Spot account to access your personalized health dashboard, articles, and wellness resources.
signin.keywords: sign in, login, Women Spot, account, authentication, health dashboard

signup.title: Sign Up - Women Spot
signup.description: Create your Women Spot account to access personalized health content, track your wellness journey, and join our health community.
signup.keywords: sign up, register, create account, Women Spot, health community, wellness tracking

dashboard.title: Dashboard - Women Spot
dashboard.description: Your personalized health overview and insights. Track your health goals, progress, and access your health articles and resources.
dashboard.keywords: health dashboard, health goals, progress tracking, health insights, personal health, wellness tracking

profile.title: Profile - Women Spot
profile.description: Manage your Women Spot account settings, preferences, and personal information. Customize your health experience and language preferences.
profile.keywords: user profile, account settings, preferences, personal information, Women Spot settings, language preferences

createArticle.title: Create Article - Women Spot
createArticle.description: Share your health knowledge with the community. Create and publish health articles, tips, and wellness content in multiple languages.
createArticle.keywords: create article, write health content, publish health tips, wellness articles, health knowledge sharing, content creation

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password - Women Spot
forgotPassword.description: Reset your Women Spot password. Enter your email address and we'll send you a secure link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.keywords: forgot password, reset password, password recovery, Women Spot login, account recovery

resetPassword.title: Reset Password - Women Spot
resetPassword.description: Set your new password for your Women Spot account. Enter your new password below to complete the password reset process.
resetPassword.keywords: reset password, new password, password change, Women Spot security, account security
